One thing I've learned in my #rstats training work: current R users underestimate how scary R is to new users. 

This email is a case in point: "the way you speak shows you understand how terrifying it is to get started and how inaccessible R appears to the uninitiated"

Since various SW benchmarks are going around today... A short thread on why I use #rstats. 

Put simply, it offers by far the fastest & most efficient tools for the work I do (i.e. mostly data wrangling & applied econometrics).
